description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a correspondence care setting type. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Personal welfare lasting power of attorney findings' subset with subset original id 47771000000138; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Personal welfare lasting power of attorney findings simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999001951000000107

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

display.value: Has appointed person with personal welfare lasting power of attorney (Mental Capacity Act 2005) (finding)
Has appointed person with personal welfare lasting power of attorney with authority for life sustaining decisions (Mental Capacity Act 2005) (finding)
